tool_description: Classifies contract clauses into standard legal categories such as payment terms, liability, termination, IP rights, and compliance requirements.

clause_texts.description: Array of clause text strings to be categorized

contract_type.description: Type of contract: service, employment, sale, license, partnership, or general

classification_depth.description: Classification detail level: basic, standard, or comprehensive

custom_categories.description: Additional custom categories to include in classification

error_messages: Empty clause array: Provide at least one clause text for categorization.
Invalid contract type: Use one of [service, employment, sale, license, partnership, general].
Invalid classification depth: Use one of [basic, standard, comprehensive].
Clause text too long: Individual clauses should not exceed 5000 characters.
Too many clauses: Maximum 200 clauses can be processed in a single request.
usage: Provide an array of clause_texts, optionally specify contract_type, classification_depth, and custom_categories. Returns categorized clauses with confidence scores.

categories.description: Assigned category for each clause in the input order

confidence_scores.description: Confidence score for each categorization (0.0 to 1.0)

category_summary.description: Summary of clause distribution across categories

uncategorized_count.description: Number of clauses that could not be categorized
